arts.ttl: Mario Götze goal gives Eintracht Frankfurt edge over 10-man VfB Stuttgart
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt boosted their hopes of a top-four finish on Matchday 27 as Mario Götze's goal was enough for a 1-0 win over ten-man VfB Stuttgart. The game's turning point came in the 58th minute when Stuttgart's Al-Dakhil received a straight red card for pulling down Hugo Ekitiké as the last man.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Eintracht Frankfurt 1-0 VfB Stuttgart
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt vs VfB Stuttgart, the youngest teams and on their days the funnest teams in the league faced off, with the hosts running out 1-0 winners. The best cliché…

arts.ttl: Man City 'enter transfer race' for Eintracht Frankfurt star amid Arsenal, Liverpool competition
arts.sum: Manchester City reportedly join the race to sign Eintracht Frankfurt midfielder Hugo Larsson, who is attracting interest from Arsenal and Liverpool

arts.ttl: Manchester City enter race to sign Hugo Larsson
arts.sum: The race to sign Hugo Larsson (20) is hotting up with Manchester City joining fellow Premier League clubs pursuing the Eintracht Frankfurt midfielder, according to Sky Germany. Talks have already…

arts.ttl: Report: Hugo Ekitiké’s value skyrockets as Liverpool weigh up move for Frankfurt ace
arts.sum: Arsenal, Liverpool, and Manchester United will need to cough up at least €80m if they want to secure the signing of Hugo Ekitike from Eintracht Frankfurt this summer. According to German outlet Bild, the Bundesliga club has set their price and is standing firm – with the level of interest in the forward, they are […] The post Report: Hugo Ekitiké’s value skyrockets as Liverpool weigh up move for Frankfurt ace appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt vs. VfB Stuttgart preview: Huge clash between European hopefuls
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt welcome VfB Stuttgart to Deutsche Bank Park this weekend, with Saturday's Topspiel looking to be a potential season-defining clash for the Europe chasing pair.

arts.ttl: Bayern face competition from England for Woltemade
arts.sum: As well as Bayern Munich, Brighton & Hove Albion and Everton are also said to be interested in VfB Stuttgart's Nick Woltemade.

arts.ttl: Hoeness discusses Undav's dip in form
arts.sum: Sebastian Hoeness says Deniz Undav is longing for "the feeling of success" after failing to score in his last six games.

arts.ttl: Everton and Brighton the next clubs to show interest in VfB Stuttgart’s Nick Woltemade
arts.sum: Bild reports that Everton and Brighton are also interested in VfB Stuttgart striker Nick Woltemade, who is a hot topic at the moment. Earlier in the week, it was reported that…

arts.ttl: Jungen Wilden 2.0: how Stuttgart's young team could make history
arts.sum: The youngest of Stuttgart's regular players, 22-year-old Frenchman Enzo Millot, has been a fixture in Hoeneß's team since last season. Across 25 appearances in the league, Millot has scored four times and assisted a further four, making him the third best goal contributor in the squad behind Nick Woltemade and Ermedin Demirović, who have already reached double figures for goals and assists.
